title: One wounded in Chicago Lawn shooting
text:
One person was wounded in a shooting in the Chicago Lawn neighborhood on the South Side early Saturday.
About 1:10 a.m., a male — whose age was not immediately known — was shot in the 7100 block of South Rockwell, police said.
Further details were unavailable early Saturday.
